name: PowerCenter:Avoid uncached lookup
description: List all lookup transformation where the caching option is not activated
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders with Lookup Transformations not having "yes" in cache enabled value.
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, Lookup Transformation full name
rationale: When you use uncached and connected lookup in a flow, you have a call to the database for each source row data. This could have a huge performance impact.
remediation: Use whenever possible cached lookup. If you use uncached lookup, keep in mind to minimize input data so that database calls return the minimum amount of data.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
